name: JIRA_BASE_URL
description: The base URL for your Jira instance (e.g., https://your-company.atlassian.net).

name: JIRA_TOKEN
description: A Jira Personal Access Token (PAT) with appropriate permissions to read and modify issues. Exactly one of JIRA_TOKEN or JIRA_COOKIE must be set.

name: JIRA_COOKIE
description: A Jira session cookie value (e.g., the full Cookie header string). Useful for environments where a PAT is not available. Exactly one of JIRA_TOKEN or JIRA_COOKIE must be set.

name: JIRA_INSECURE_SKIP_VERIFY
description: Set to 'true' to disable TLS certificate validation. Use with caution, as this is a security risk. Recommended only for self-hosted Jira instances with self-signed certificates.
